Question:

Question:
Yikuphi kulokhu okwenza ukunquma ukuhlobana kokuziphendukela kwemvelo kwezinhlobo ezahlukene ngokusekelwe ngokulandelana kwe-amino acid yamaprotheni e-homologous ngokuvamile okunembile kunokuzimisela kokuhlobene okusekelwe ekulandeleni kwe-nucleotide yezakhi zofuzo ze-homologous?
A.Ukuguqulwa buthule
B.Gene duplications
C.Izenzakalo ze-Translocation ezishintsha ukulandelana kwezakhi zofuzo
D.Ukuwela-phezu
GivenAnswer:
A. Ukuguqulwa buthule

Ukuguqulwa buthule (silent mutations) yizinguquko ku-DNA ezingenamphumela ekuguqulweni kwe-amino acid yephrotheni. Lokhu kusho ukuthi, noma ukulandelana kwe-nucleotide kungashintsha, ukulandelana kwe-amino acid kungahlala kungashintshi. Lokhu kwenza ukulandelana kwe-amino acid kube yindlela ethembekile kakhulu yokuhlola ukuhlobana kokuziphendukela kwemvelo kwezinhlobo ezahlukene, ngoba izinguquko ezithule azithinti ukulandelana kwe-amino acid futhi ngaleyo ndlela azithinti umsebenzi wephrotheni. Ngakho-ke, ukulandelana kwe-amino acid kuvame ukunikeza isithombe esinembile kakhulu sokuhlobana kwezinhlobo kunokulandelana kwe-nucleotide, okungathinteka kalula izinguquko ezithule.

Question:
Amanye amanzi e-Mars aqandisiwe emhlabathini kanye nama-ice caps futhi amanye alahlekile ngenxa yokuhlubula umoya welanga kodwa amanzi amaningi okuqala kucatshangwa ukuthi alahlekile ngenye indlela. Kwenzekani kulokhu "okulahlekile"amanzi?
A.yahlutshwa yi-magnetic field lapho yehla ngokushesha ngamandla
B.yaphulwa yaba yi-hydrogen ne-oksijini ngokukhanya kwe-ultraviolet futhi i-hydrogen yalahleka ngokuphunyuka okushisayo
C.yadliwa yimpucuko yamaMartians anxanelekile
D.yahwatha ngesikhathi sezintaba-mlilo ezinamandla futhi yalahleka emkhathini ngokuphunyuka okushisayo
GivenAnswer:
B. Yaphulwa yaba yi-hydrogen ne-oksijini ngokukhanya kwe-ultraviolet futhi i-hydrogen yalahleka ngokuphunyuka okushisayo.

Amanzi e-Mars amaningi kucatshangwa ukuthi alahleka ngenxa yokuthi amanzi (H2O) aphukile abe yi-hydrogen ne-oksijini ngenxa yokukhanya kwe-ultraviolet. I-hydrogen, eyingxenye elula kakhulu, yalahleka ngokuphunyuka okushisayo emkhathini. Lokhu kwenzeka ngoba i-hydrogen inesisindo esincane futhi ingaphunyuka kalula emkhathini we-Mars, ongenawo amandla amakhulu okugcina izakhi ezilula.

Question:
Lo mbuzo ubhekisela olwazini olulandelayo.
Okokuqala kumele siphawule ukuthi i-cosmos iyindilinga ngefomu, ngokwengxenye ngoba leli fomu liyonke eliphelele elingadingi amalunga, liphelele kunazo zonke, ngokwengxenye ngoba lenza ifomu le-capacious kakhulu, elifanele kakhulu ukuqukatha nokulondoloza yonke into; noma futhi ngoba zonke izingxenye ezihlanganisiwe zendalo yonke, okungukuthi ilanga, inyanga namaplanethi zivela kuleli fomu; noma ngoba yonke into izama ukuthola leli fomu, njengoba kubonakala esimweni samaconsi amanzi nezinye imizimba yamanzi uma bezama ukuzichaza. Ngakho akekho oyothandabuza ukuthi lesi simo singesemizimba yasezulwini. ...
Ngakho-ke ukuthi umhlaba nawo uyindilinga akubuzwa, ngoba ucindezela kusuka kuzo zonke izinhlangothi maphakathi nawo. Nakuba ngenxa yokuphakama kwezintaba kanye nokucindezeleka kwezigodi isiyingi esiphelele asikwazi ukuqondwa, nokho lokhu akuphazamisi imvelo ejwayelekile eyindilinga yomhlaba. ...
Njengoba sekukhonjisiwe ukuthi umhlaba unesimo se-sphere, kumele sicabangele ukuthi ukunyakaza nakho kuhambisana yini nalesi simo, nokuthi umhlaba uphethe yiphi indawo endaweni yonke. ... Iningi elikhulu lababhali yebo liyavuma ukuthi umhlaba umi maphakathi nendawo yonke, futhi ubheka njengento engacabangeki futhi ehlekisayo ukucabanga okuphambene nalokho. Kodwa uma udaba lulinganiswa ngokucophelela, kuzobonakala ukuthi umbuzo awukalungiswa ngakho-ke akufanele neze ubhekwe kalula. Lonke ushintsho lwendawo olubonwayo lufanele, okungukuthi, ukunyakaza kwento ebonakalayo noma yombukeli, noma ukunyakaza kokubili. ... Manje kuvela emhlabeni ukuthi ukuguquka kwamazulu kubonwa futhi kukhiqizwa amehlo ethu. Ngakho-ke uma umhlaba unganyakazi lokhu kunyakaza kumele kwenzeke kukho konke okungaphandle komhlaba, kodwa ngendlela ehlukile kunokuba yonke into emhlabeni ihambe, futhi kulolu hlobo kuyinguquko yansuku zonke. Ngakho lokhu kubonakala kuthinta yonke indalo, okungukuthi, yonke into engaphandle komhlaba ngaphandle komhlaba owodwa uqobo. Uma, nokho, umuntu kufanele avume ukuthi lokhu kunyakaza kwakungeyona into engavamile emazulwini, kodwa ukuthi umhlaba wawujikeleza usuka entshonalanga uye empumalanga, futhi uma lokhu kwakubhekwa ngokucophelela maqondana nokuphuma nokushona kwelanga okubonakalayo, inyanga nezinkanyezi, kwakuzotholakala ukuthi lesi kwakuyisimo sangempela."
UNicolas Copernicus, Izinguquko Zemizimba Yasezulwini, 1543
Isiqephu singasetshenziswa njengobufakazi bokuthi uCopernicus wayehlukile kwizazi zefilosofi zemvelo zendabuko, ze-Aristotelian zosuku lwakhe ngoba wasikisela ukuthi
A.i-cosmos iyindilinga

D. umhlaba awumile

UNicolas Copernicus waphikisa umbono wendabuko we-Aristotelian wokuthi umhlaba umi maphakathi nendawo yonke futhi awunyakazi. Esikhundleni salokho, waphakamisa ukuthi umhlaba uyazungeza, usuka entshonalanga uye empumalanga, okwakuyisiphakamiso esisha futhi esiphikisana nombono wendabuko.

Question:
I-voltage eyenziwe ku-inductor imelwe njengoba,
A.umkhiqizo we-inductance yayo kanye ne-current ngayo.
B.isilinganiso se-inductance yayo kuze kube manje ngayo.
C.isilinganiso samanje ngokusebenzisa kwayo ku-inductance yayo.
D.umkhiqizo we-inductance yayo kanye nezinga lokushintsha kwamanje ngayo.
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele yi-D. umkhiqizo we-inductance yayo kanye nezinga lokushintsha kwamanje ngayo.

Ngokwe-electromagnetic induction, i-voltage (V) eyenziwe ku-inductor (L) imelwe ngokuthi:

\[ V = L \frac{dI}{dt} \]

lapho:
- \( V \) kuyivoltage eyenziwe ku-inductor,
- \( L \) kuyinductance ye-inductor,
- \( \frac{dI}{dt} \) kuyizinga lokushintsha kwamanje (current) ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

Ngakho-ke, i-voltage eyenziwe ku-inductor iyisilinganiso se-inductance yayo kanye nezinga lokushintsha kwamanje ngayo.

Question:

Ucwaningo lwabo lwabonisa ukuthi izilwane zifunda ngokushesha ukuxhumanisa ukudla noma isiphuzo esithile nesicanucanu (ukugula), kunokuxhumanisa ezinye izinhlobo zokucasulwa. Question:
Yiziphi kulezi zinto ezilandelayo ezizobhekwa njengento "yokudonsa" kuRiva lapho ucabangela ukuhamba kusuka eNdiya kuya e-United States?
A.Ubuphofu be-Abject
B.Umsebenzi ongcono kanye namaholo aphezulu
C.Uhlelo lwe-caste lwaseNdiya
D.Udlame endaweni ahlala kuyo
GivenAnswer:
Uma ucabangela ukuhamba kusuka eNdiya kuya e-United States, izinto ezizobhekwa njengento "yokudonsa" (pull factors) yilezo ezikhanga abantu ukuthi bathuthele kwenye indawo ngenxa yezinzuzo noma amathuba angcono. Kulezi zinto ezishiwo, into ezobhekwa njengento "yokudonsa" kuRiva yile:

B. Umsebenzi ongcono kanye namaholo aphezulu

Lezi zinto zikhanga abantu ukuthi bathuthele e-United States ngenxa yamathuba angcono emisebenzi kanye namaholo aphezulu, okuyizinto ezikhuthaza abantu ukuthi bathuthele kuleli zwe. Ezinye izinto ezishiwo (A, C, D) zingabhekwa njengezinto "zokucindezela" (push factors), ezikhuthaza abantu ukuthi bashiye izindawo zabo ngenxa yezimo ezimbi noma izinkinga abahlangabezana nazo.

Question:

B.okuncane okuhlonziwe ngokucacile ngemibono ehambisanayo yezombusazwe

Question:
Iqiniso lokuthi imvamisa yokumuncwa kwe-infrared ye-deuterium chloride (DCl) ishintshwa kuleyo ye-hydrogen chloride (HCl) kungenxa yomehluko wabo
A.ukusatshalaliswa kwe-electron
B.dipole mzuzu
C.amandla njalo
D.mass encishisiwe
GivenAnswer:
Iqiniso lokuthi imvamisa yokumuncwa kwe-infrared ye-deuterium chloride (DCl) ishintshwa kuleyo ye-hydrogen chloride (HCl) kungenxa yomehluko wabo:

D. mass encishisiwe

Ukushintsha kwemvamisa yokumuncwa kwe-infrared phakathi kwe-DCl ne-HCl kungenxa yokuthi i-deuterium (D) inesisindo esiphindwe kabili kunesika-hydrogen (H). Lokhu kuthinta imvamisa yokudlidliza kwe-molecule, njengoba imvamisa yokudlidliza kwe-molecule incike kububanzi bebhondi kanye nemisa yamathambo ahlangene. Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele iwukuthi:

Question:
Thola i- $ - \ dfrac{1}{-3}\ cdot \ cfrac{1} {~ \ frac{1}{-3}~}.$
A.1
B.-1
C.0
D.2
GivenAnswer:
Ake sibheke ngokucophelela isibalo esinikeziwe:

\[ - \dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot \cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}} \]

Okokuqala, ake sibheke ingxenye yokuqala:

\[ - \dfrac{1}{-3} \]

Lapha, uma sithatha inombolo ephikisayo yephikisi, sizothola:

\[ - \dfrac{1}{-3} = \dfrac{1}{3} \]

Manje, ake sibheke ingxenye yesibili:

\[ \cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}} \]

Uma sithatha inombolo ephikisayo yephikisi, sizothola:

\[ \cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}} = -3 \]

Manje, ake sibuyisele zonke izingxenye ndawonye:

\[ \dfrac{1}{3} \cdot (-3) \]

Uma sithatha lokhu, sizothola:

\[ \dfrac{1}{3} \cdot (-3) = -1 \]

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele ngu:

B. -1

Question:
Esikhathini xy-indiza, igrafu x ^ (log y) = y ^ log x kuyinto
A.i-quadrant yokuqala evulekile
B.ijika elivaliwe
C.i-ray ku-quadrant yokuqala evulekile
D.iphuzu elilodwa
GivenAnswer:
Ake sihlole igrafu ye-equation x^(log y) = y^(log x) esikhathini xy-indiza.

Okokuqala, ake sibone ukuthi yini le equation ethi x^(log y) = y^(log x) isho. Singasebenzisa i-logarithm ukuze siqonde kangcono:

1. Thatha i-logarithm kuzo zombili izinhlangothi ze-equation:
   log(x^(log y)) = log(y^(log x))

2. Sebenzisa izakhiwo ze-logarithm (log(a^b) = b * log(a)):
   (log y) * log x = (log x) * log y

3. Lokhu kusho ukuthi (log y) * log x = (log x) * log y, okusho ukuthi le equation isebenza kuzo zonke izixazululo ezihlangabezana nale mfuneko.

Manje, ake sihlole ukuthi le equation isho ukuthini esikhathini xy-indiza. Uma sibheka izixazululo ezihlangabezana nale equation, sizobona ukuthi:

- Uma x = y, i-equation izoba yiqiniso ngoba x^(log x) = x^(log x).
- Uma x ≠ y, sizoba nezimo ezinzima kakhulu, kodwa ngokujwayelekile, izixazululo zizoba ku-quadrant yokuqala lapho x > 0 no y > 0.

Ngakho-ke, igrafu ye-equation x^(log y) = y^(log x) izoba ku-quadrant yokuqala evulekile, ngoba izixazululo zayo zikhona lapho x > 0 no y > 0.

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele yi:

A. i-quadrant yokuqala evulekile

Question:
K-fold cross-ukuqinisekiswa kuyinto
A.umugqa ku-K
B.quadratic e K
C.cubic e K
D.exponential in K
GivenAnswer:
K-fold cross-ukuqinisekiswa (cross-validation) akuyona into ehambisana nemigqa, quadratic, cubic, noma exponential e K. K-fold cross-validation iyindlela esetshenziswa ekuhloleni ukusebenza kwemodeli yokufunda ngomshini. Lapha, "K" imele inani lezigaba (folds) lapho idatha ihlukaniswa khona.

Inqubo ye-K-fold cross-validation ihamba kanje:
1. Idatha ihlukaniswa yaba izingxenye ezingu-K ezilinganayo.
2. Imodeli ifundiswa (trained) ku-K-1 izingxenye zedatha, kanti ingxenye esele (eyodwa) isetshenziswa ukuhlola (validate) imodeli.
3. Le nqubo iphindaphindwa izikhathi ezingu-K, njalo ngenkathi kuhlolwa ingxenye ehlukile.
4. Imiphumela yokuhlola (validation results) iyahlanganiswa ukuze kutholwe isilinganiso sokusebenza kwemodeli.

Ngakho-ke, K-fold cross-validation iyindlela yokuhlola imodeli, futhi ayihambisani nemigqa, quadratic, cubic, noma exponential e K.

Question:
Ukusebenza kahle kwe-quantum ye-photon detector ngu-0.1. Uma ama-photons angu-100 ethunyelwa ku-detector, enye ngemuva kwenye, umtshina uzothola ama-photons
A.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-4
B.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-3
C.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-1
D.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-0.1
GivenAnswer:
Ukusebenza kahle kwe-quantum ye-photon detector ngu-0.1 kusho ukuthi umtshina uzothola ama-photons angu-10% alawo athunyelwa kuwo. Uma ama-photons angu-100 ethunyelwa ku-detector, isilinganiso se-photons ezotholwa umtshina sizoba:

\[ \text{Isilinganiso se-photons ezotholwa} = 0.1 \times 100 = 10 \]

Ukuphambuka okujwayelekile (rms deviation) kwezinombolo ze-photons ezitholakele kungabalwa kusetshenziswa izibalo ze-binomial distribution, lapho ukuphambuka okujwayelekile kwe-binomial distribution kunikezwa yi:

\[ \sigma = \sqrt{n \cdot p \cdot (1 - p)} \]

Lapho:
- \( n \) inani lama-photons athunyelwe (100),
- \( p \) ukusebenza kahle kwe-detector (0.1).

Ngakho-ke:

\[ \sigma = \sqrt{100 \cdot 0.1 \cdot (1 - 0.1)} = \sqrt{100 \cdot 0.1 \cdot 0.9} = \sqrt{9} = 3 \]

Ngakho-ke, umtshina uzothola isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-3.

Impendulo efanele yi:

B. isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-3

Question:
Isitatimende 1 | Eqenjini (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}. Isitatimende 2 | Eqenjini (ab)^n = a^nb^n.
A.Yiqiniso, Yiqiniso
B.Amanga, Amanga
C.Yiqiniso, Amanga
D.Amanga, Yiqiniso
GivenAnswer:
Ake sihlole isitatimende ngasinye ngokweqembu lezibalo.

Isitatimende 1: Eqenjini (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}.
- Eqenjini, uma sithatha i-inverse yephindaphinda, kufanele siqaphele ukuthi (ab)^{-1} = b^{-1}a^{-1}. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi uma sithatha i-inverse yephindaphinda, kufanele siqale nge-inverse yesici sesibili bese sihamba ngemuva. Ngakho-ke, (ab)^{-2} = ((ab)^{-1})^2 = (b^{-1}a^{-1})^2 = b^{-1}a^{-1}b^{-1}a^{-1}, okungafani ne b^{-2}a^{-2}. Ngakho-ke, lesi sitatimende amanga.

Isitatimende 2: Eqenjini (ab)^n = a^nb^n.
- Eqenjini, lokhu akuyona into ejwayelekile. Eqenjini elijwayelekile, (ab)^n akulingani no a^nb^n. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi izici zeqembu azivamile ukuhambisana ngendlela efanayo nezinombolo ezijwayelekile. Ngakho-ke, lesi sitatimende amanga.

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele yi:
B. Amanga, Amanga

Question:
Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okungakhiqiza kakhulu ukukhula komnotho okunamandla ngokuhamba kwesikhathi?
A.Ukusetshenziswa okusheshayo okuningi kwemithombo yemvelo.
B.Amazinga aphezulu okungafundi kwabantu abadala.
C.Isitoko esiwayo sezimpahla zemali.
D.Izikweletu zentela yokutshala izimali.
GivenAnswer:
Ukukhula komnotho okunamandla ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kuvame ukuxhumana kakhulu nezici ezikhuthaza imfundo, ukuqeqeshwa, kanye nokutshalwa kwezimali okusebenzayo. Ngakho-ke, impendulo engaba nomthelela omkhulu ekukhuleni komnotho esikhathini eside ingaba:

D. Izikweletu zentela yokutshala izimali.

Izikweletu zentela yokutshala izimali zingakhuthaza izinkampani kanye nabatshalizimali ukuthi batshale imali emikhakheni ehlukahlukene yomnotho, okuholela ekwandeni kwemisebenzi, ukuthuthukiswa kobuchwepheshe, kanye nokwanda kokukhiqiza. Lokhu kungaholela ekukhuleni komnotho okuqhubekayo futhi okuhlala isikhathi eside.

Izinketho ezisele zinezinkinga ezithile:

A. Ukusetshenziswa okusheshayo okuningi kwemithombo yemvelo kungaholela ekuphelelweni kwemithombo kanye nemiphumela emibi yemvelo, okungase kube nomthelela omubi ekukhuleni komnotho esikhathini eside.

B. Amazinga aphezulu okungafundi kwabantu abadala angaba nomthelela omubi ekukhuleni komnotho ngoba abantu abangenalo ulwazi oludingekayo bangase bangakwazi ukufaka isandla ngokugcwele emnothweni.

C. Isitoko esiwayo sezimpahla zemali singase sikhombise ukwehla kokutshalwa kwezimali kanye nokungathembeki kwezimakethe, okungase kube nomthelela omubi ekukhuleni komnotho.

Ngakho-ke, izikweletu zentela yokutshala izimali (D) zingaba yindlela ephumelela kakhulu yokukhuthaza ukukhula komnotho okuqhubekayo.

Question:
Yimaphi amasethi alandelayo wezintambo ze-bit AYIKWAZI ukuchazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile?
A.Zonke izintambo ze-bit ezinenani le-zeros liyi-multiple of five
B.Zonke izintambo ze-bit eziqala nge-zero futhi ziphela ngenye
C.Zonke izintambo kancane nge inombolo ngisho zeros
D.Zonke izintambo kancane nge ezingaphezu kuka zeros
GivenAnswer:
Amasethi wezintambo ze-bit angachazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile (regular expression) anemikhawulo ethile. Ake sihlole amasethi wezintambo ze-bit akhonjisiwe:

A. Zonke izintambo ze-bit ezinenani le-zeros liyi-multiple of five
- Lesi sethi asikwazi ukuchazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi ukubala inani le-zeros eliyi-multiple of five kudinga isimo esingapheli (unbounded memory), okuyinto engaphezu kwamandla enkulumo ejwayelekile.

B. Zonke izintambo ze-bit eziqala nge-zero futhi ziphela ngenye
- Lesi sethi singachazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile. Isibonelo, inkulumo ejwayelekile engachaza lesi sethi ingaba: `0[01]*1`.

C. Zonke izintambo kancane nge inombolo ngisho zeros
- Lesi sethi singachazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile. Isibonelo, inkulumo ejwayelekile engachaza lesi sethi ingaba: `([01]*00)*([01]*11)*([01]*10)*([01]*01)*`.

D. Zonke izintambo kancane nge ezingaphezu kuka zeros
- Lesi sethi asikwazi ukuchazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi ukubala inani le-zeros elingaphezu kwenani le-ones kudinga isimo esingapheli (unbounded memory), okuyinto engaphezu kwamandla enkulumo ejwayelekile.

Ngakho-ke, amasethi wezintambo ze-bit angachazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile yi:
B. Zonke izintambo ze-bit eziqala nge-zero futhi ziphela ngenye
C. Zonke izintambo kancane nge inombolo ngisho zeros

Amasethi wezintambo ze-bit AYIKWAZI ukuchazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile yi:
A. Zonke izintambo ze-bit ezinenani le-zeros liyi-multiple of five
D. Zonke izintambo kancane nge ezingaphezu kuka zeros

Question:
Umnotho usekuwohlokeni okujulile. Njengoba kubhekwe lesi simo somnotho yiziphi kulezi zitatimende ezilandelayo mayelana nenqubomgomo yemali ezinembile?
A.Inqubomgomo yokwandisa yayizokwenza kube kubi kakhulu kuphela ukwehla komnotho.
B.Inqubomgomo yokwandisa ikhulisa kakhulu isidingo esihlanganisiwe uma ukutshalwa kwezimali kuzwela izinguquko zezinga lenzalo.
C.Inqubomgomo yokunciphisa iyisikhuthazo esifanele sokutshalwa kwezimali nokusetshenziswa.
D.Uma isidingo semali ngokuphelele nokunwebeka ukunwetshwa inqubomgomo yemali kungase kube ngempela ngempumelelo.
GivenAnswer:
Uma umnotho usekuwohlokeni okujulile, kubalulekile ukuqonda ukuthi izinqubomgomo zemali zingaba nomthelela omkhulu ekubuyiseni umnotho esimeni esingcono. Ake sihlole izitatimende ezihlukene:

A. **Inqubomgomo yokwandisa yayizokwenza kube kubi kakhulu kuphela ukwehla komnotho.**
   - Lokhu akulona iqiniso. Inqubomgomo yokwandisa (expansionary monetary policy) ihlose ukukhulisa isidingo esihlanganisiwe ngokwehlisa izinga lenzalo kanye nokwandisa imali esesandleni. Lokhu kungasiza ukuvuselela umnotho.

B. **Inqubomgomo yokwandisa ikhulisa kakhulu isidingo esihlanganisiwe uma ukutshalwa kwezimali kuzwela izinguquko zezinga lenzalo.**
   - Lokhu kuyiqiniso. Uma izinga lenzalo lehla, izindleko zokuboleka ziyehla, okwenza kube lula kubatshalizimali nabathengi ukuboleka nokutshalwa kwezimali, ngaleyo ndlela kukhuphule isidingo esihlanganisiwe.

C. **Inqubomgomo yokunciphisa iyisikhuthazo esifanele sokutshalwa kwezimali nokusetshenziswa.**
   - Lokhu akulona iqiniso. Inqubomgomo yokunciphisa (contractionary monetary policy) ihlose ukwehlisa isidingo esihlanganisiwe ngokukhuphula izinga lenzalo kanye nokunciphisa imali esesandleni. Lokhu kuvame ukusetshenziswa uma kunesidingo sokwehlisa ukwehla kwamanani entengo (inflation), hhayi uma umnotho usekuwohlokeni.

D. **Uma isidingo semali ngokuphelele nokunwebeka ukunwetshwa inqubomgomo yemali kungase kube ngempela ngempumelelo.**
   - Lokhu kuyiqiniso. Uma abantu nezinkampani bezwela izinguquko ezingeni lenzalo, inqubomgomo yokwandisa ingaba nomthelela omkhulu ekukhuliseni isidingo esihlanganisiwe, ngaleyo ndlela isize ekubuyiseni umnotho esimeni esingcono.

Ngakho-ke, isitatimende esinembile mayelana nenqubomgomo yemali esimweni sokwehla komnotho esijulile yilesi:

**B. Inqubomgomo yokwandisa ikhulisa kakhulu isidingo esihlanganisiwe uma ukutshalwa kwezimali kuzwela izinguquko zezinga lenzalo.**

Question:
Ithangi lisesimweni se-prism engunxantathu. Uma isisekelo esingunxantathu sinendawo engamamitha-skwele angu-116, futhi ithangi liyizinyawo ezingama-30 ubude, ithangi lizoqukatha amanzi angakanani uma ligcwele?
A.1725 ft^3
B.1740 ft^3
C.3480 ft^3
D.6960 ft^3
GivenAnswer:
Ukuze sithole ivolumu yethangi elisesimweni se-prism engunxantathu, sidinga ukusebenzisa ifomula yevolumu ye-prism:

\[ \text{Ivolumu} = \text{Indawo yesisekelo} \times \text{Ubude} \]

Lapha, sinikezwe indawo yesisekelo esingunxantathu (116 square meters) kanye nobude bethangi (30 feet). Kodwa-ke, sidinga ukuthi izilinganiso zibe kumayunithi afanayo. Sizoguqula indawo yesisekelo ibe ngamayunithi we-square feet.

1 square meter = 10.7639 square feet

\[ 116 \text{ square meters} \times 10.7639 \text{ square feet per square meter} = 1244.6124 \text{ square feet} \]

Manje, singasebenzisa ifomula yevolumu:

\[ \text{Ivolumu} = \text{Indawo yesisekelo} \times \text{Ubude} \]
\[ \text{Ivolumu} = 1244.6124 \text{ square feet} \times 30 \text{ feet} \]
\[ \text{Ivolumu} = 37338.372 \text{ cubic feet} \]

Kodwa-ke, lokhu akuhambisani nezinketho ezinikeziwe. Kukhona iphutha ekuguquleni noma ekubhaleni izinketho. Ake sibheke izinketho ezinikeziwe futhi sibone ukuthi yikuphi okungahambisana kakhulu:

A. 1725 ft³
B. 1740 ft³
C. 3480 ft³
D. 6960 ft³

Ngokubheka izinketho, kungenzeka ukuthi indawo yesisekelo yayivele inikezwe ngamayunithi we-square feet, hhayi square meters. Uma sithatha indawo yesisekelo ibe ngamayunithi we-square feet:

\[ \text{Ivolumu} = 116 \text{ square feet} \times 30 \text{ feet} \]
\[ \text{Ivolumu} = 3480 \text{ cubic feet} \]

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele izoba:

C. 3480 ft³

Question:
Nquma ukuhlushwa kwe-H + (aq) ku-1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, isixazululo. (I-Ka ye-phenol yi-1 × 10 ^ -10.)
A.1 × 10^-10 M
B.1 × 10^-9 M
C.1 × 10^-3 M
D.1 × 10^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Ukuze sithole ukuhlushwa kwe-H⁺ (aq) ku-1.0 M phenol (C₆H₅OH) isixazululo, sidinga ukusebenzisa i-Ka ye-phenol. I-Ka ye-phenol inikezwe njenge-1 × 10⁻¹⁰.

I-phenol iyi-acid ebuthakathaka, futhi i-ionization yayo ingabhalwa kanje:

\[ \text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{OH} \rightleftharpoons \text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{O}^- + \text{H}^+ \]

I-Ka ye-phenol inikezwe njenge:

\[ \text{Ka} = \frac{[\text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{O}^-][\text{H}^+]}{[\text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{OH}]} \]

Sicabanga ukuthi ukuhlushwa kokuqala kwe-phenol kuyi-1.0 M, futhi asikaze kube khona i-C₆H₅O⁻ noma i-H⁺ ekuqaleni. Uma i-phenol ionizes, ake sithi inani elincane le-x M li-ionize, ngakho-ke:

\[ [\text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{OH}] \approx 1.0 - x \approx 1.0 \, \text{M} \]
\[ [\text{C}_6\text{H}_5\text{O}^-] = x \, \text{M} \]
\[ [\text{H}^+] = x \, \text{M} \]

Ngakho-ke, i-Ka ingabhalwa kanje:

\[ \text{Ka} = \frac{x \cdot x}{1.0} = x^2 \]

\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = x^2 \]

\[ x = \sqrt{1 \times 10^{-10}} \]

\[ x = 1 \times 10^{-5} \]

Ngakho-ke, ukuhlushwa kwe-H⁺ (aq) ku-1.0 M phenol isixazululo ngu:

D. 1 × 10⁻⁵ M

Question:
Abafundi baqhuba ukuzivocavoca kokuhlukaniswa kwe-pigment yezitshalo okudinga ukuthi basebenzise igumbi le-chromatography elivaliwe elinenani elincane le-acetone ezansi kwekamelo. Izixwayiso zokuphepha ze-acetone zihlanganisa isitatimende sokuthi i-eye and skin irritant futhi ine-vapors evuthayo. Kulokhu okulandelayo' yiziphi izinyathelo zokuphepha okufanele abafundi bazithathele ngenkathi beqhuba ukuzivocavoca?
A.Ukubeka amagilavu abuyisela umlilo ukuthwala igumbi ku-hood fume uma i-acetone ibamba umlilo
B.Ukubeka igumbi kwikhabhinethi evaliwe, emnyama isikhathi sokuhlukaniswa kwe-pigment
C.Ukugqoka amagilavu esikhumba nokumboza ikhala nomlomo nge-particle mask
D.Ukugqoka izibuko namagilavu ohlobo lwe-nitrile nokugcina zonke izitsha ze-acetone zivaliwe
GivenAnswer:
Uma usebenza nge-acetone, kubalulekile ukuthatha izinyathelo zokuphepha ezilungile ukuze uvikeleke ekulimaleni. I-acetone iyaziwa ngokuba yi-eye and skin irritant futhi ine-vapors evuthayo, ngakho-ke izinyathelo zokuphepha kufanele zihlanganise ukuvikela amehlo, isikhumba, nokuphepha komlilo. Kulezi zinketho ezinikeziwe, inketho ehamba phambili izoba:

D. Ukugqoka izibuko namagilavu ohlobo lwe-nitrile nokugcina zonke izitsha ze-acetone zivaliwe.

Lezi zinyathelo zokuphepha zifaka:

1. **Ukugqoka izibuko**: Ukuvikela amehlo ekuthintaneni ne-acetone, okungabangela ukucasuka.
2. **Ukugqoka amagilavu ohlobo lwe-nitrile**: Ukuvikela isikhumba ekuthintaneni ne-acetone, okungabangela ukucasuka.
3. **Ukugcina zonke izitsha ze-acetone zivaliwe**: Ukuvimbela ukuhwamuka kwe-acetone, okungabangela izingozi zomlilo futhi kube yingozi uma kuphefumulelwa.

Lezi zinyathelo zizovikela abafundi ekulimaleni futhi zinciphise ingozi yokushaqeka komlilo ngenxa ye-vapors evuthayo ye-acetone.

Question:
Ukungasizi okufundiwe kungenzeka kakhulu ukuthi kuhlobene ngqo
A.umphumela weBarnem.
B.ukukhetha ukuzikhonza.
C.i-locus yangaphandle yokulawula.
D.ukunaka okuhle okungenamibandela.
GivenAnswer:
Ukungasizi okufundiwe kungenzeka kakhulu ukuthi kuhlobene ngqo no **C. i-locus yangaphandle yokulawula**.

Ukungasizi okufundiwe (learned helplessness) kuyisimo lapho umuntu efunda ukuthi akanaso isibopho noma amandla okushintsha izimo zakhe, ngokuvamile ngenxa yokuhlangenwe nakho okuqhubekayo kokwehluleka noma ukungakwazi ukulawula izimo ezimbi. Lokhu kuvame ukuhlotshaniswa ne-locus yangaphandle yokulawula, lapho umuntu ekholelwa ukuthi imiphumela yezenzakalo zakhe ilawulwa izici zangaphandle noma inhlanhla, kunokuba kube yizinto ezingaphakathi kuye, njengamakhono noma imizamo yakhe.

Ake sibheke izinketho ezisele:

A. Umphumela weBarnem (Barnum effect) uhlobene nokuthambekela kwabantu ukwamukela izitatimende ezivamile noma ezivulekile njengokuchaza kahle ubuntu babo, futhi akuhlangene ngqo nokungasizi okufundiwe.

B. Ukukhetha ukuzikhonza (self-serving bias) kuyithambekelo lokuthatha udumo ngempumelelo futhi unikeze izaba zokwehluleka, okuphambene nokungasizi okufundiwe lapho umuntu ekholelwa ukuthi akanawo amandla okushintsha izimo zakhe.

D. Ukunaka okuhle okungenamibandela (unconditional positive regard) kuyisimo sokwamukela nokuhlonipha umuntu ngaphandle kwemibandela, okuvame ukuhlotshaniswa nemibono kaCarl Rogers ekwelashweni kwengqondo, futhi akuhlangene ngqo nokungasizi okufundiwe.

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele kakhulu yi **C. i-locus yangaphandle yokulawula**.

Question:
Ukuhamba ngesivinini sokuqala se-1.5 × 10 ^ 6 m / s, i-proton ingena esifundeni se-magnetic field njalo yobukhulu be-1.5 T. Uma i-vector yokuqala ye-velocity ye-proton yenza i-angle ye-30 ° nge-magnetic field, bala ijubane le-proton 4 s ngemuva kokungena emkhakheni kazibuthe.
A.5.0 × 10^6 m / s
B.7.5 × 10^6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10^6 m / s
D.3.0 × 10^6 m / s
GivenAnswer:
Ukuze sibale ijubane le-proton 4 s ngemuva kokungena emkhakheni kazibuthe, sidinga ukuqonda ukuthi i-magnetic field ayishintshi ijubane le-proton, kodwa ishintsha kuphela indlela yayo. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi amandla kazibuthe asebenza ngokuma mpo ku-velocity ye-proton, okwenza i-proton ihambe ngomjikelezo noma i-helical path.

I-velocity ye-proton ingahlukaniswa ibe izingxenye ezimbili: 
- I-velocity component parallel to the magnetic field (\(v_{\parallel}\))
- I-velocity component perpendicular to the magnetic field (\(v_{\perp}\))

I-velocity component parallel to the magnetic field ayishintshi ngoba amandla kazibuthe awasebenzi kule ngxenye. I-velocity component perpendicular to the magnetic field izokwenza i-proton ihambe ngomjikelezo.

Sizobala izingxenye ze-velocity:
- \(v_{\parallel} = v \cos(\theta)\)
- \(v_{\perp} = v \sin(\theta)\)

Lapho:
- \(v = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s}\)
- \(\theta = 30^\circ\)

Bala izingxenye:
- \(v_{\parallel} = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \times \cos(30^\circ) = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \times \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \times 0.866 = 1.299 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s}\)
- \(v_{\perp} = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \times \sin(30^\circ) = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \times \frac{1}{2} = 0.75 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s}\)

Ijubane le-proton 4 s ngemuva kokungena emkhakheni kazibuthe lizoba yisamba sezingxenye ezimbili ze-velocity, kodwa njengoba i-magnetic field ayishintshi ijubane, ijubane eliphelele lihlala lifana.

Ngakho-ke, ijubane le-proton 4 s ngemuva kokungena emkhakheni kazibuthe lihlala lifana ne-velocity yokuqala:
\[ v = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \]

Impendulo ilungile:
C. \(1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s}\)

Question:
Umhleli wezinhlelo ubhale uhlelo olungezansi. Uhlelo lusebenzisa uhlu lwezinombolo ezibizwa nge-numList. Uhlelo kuhloswe ngalo ukubonisa isamba sezinombolo ezisohlwini.
 isamba ← numList [1]
 NGENANI NGALINYE KU-numList
 isamba sesamba ← + inani
 BONISA isamba
 Ukuze kuhlolwe uhlelo, umhleli wezinhlelo uqalisa i-numList ku- [0 , 1 , 4 , 5]. Uhlelo lubonisa u-10, kanti umhleli wezinhlelo uphetha ngokuthi uhlelo lusebenza njengoba kuhlosiwe. Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okuyiqiniso?
A.Isiphetho silungile; uhlelo lusebenza njengoba kuhlosiwe.
B.Isiphetho asilungile; uhlelo alubonisi inani elifanele lecala lokuhlola [0, 1, 4, 5].
C.Isiphetho asilungile; usebenzisa icala lokuhlola [0, 1, 4, 5] akwanele ukuphetha ngokuthi uhlelo lulungile.
D.Isiphetho asilungile; usebenzisa icala lokuhlola [0, 1, 4, 5] kuqinisekisa kuphela ukuthi uhlelo lusebenza ngohlu ngokulandelana okwandayo.
GivenAnswer:
Ake sihlole uhlelo oluchazwe kanye nokuhlolwa kwalo:

1. Uhlelo lusebenzisa uhlu lwezinombolo olubizwa nge-numList.
2. Uhlelo kuhloswe ngalo ukubonisa isamba sezinombolo ezisohlwini.

Uhlelo lusebenza kanje:
- isamba ← numList [1]
- NGENANI NGALINYE KU-numList
  - isamba sesamba ← + inani
- BONISA isamba

Ukuze kuhlolwe uhlelo, umhleli wezinhlelo uqalisa i-numList ku- [0, 1, 4, 5]. Uhlelo lubonisa u-10.

Ake sihlole ukuthi uhlelo lusebenza kahle yini:

1. isamba ← numList [1]
   - Lokhu kusho ukuthi isamba siqala ngenani lokuqala ku-numList, okuyi-0.

2. NGENANI NGALINYE KU-numList
   - Lokhu kusho ukuthi uhlelo luzodlula kuzo zonke izinombolo ezisohlwini.

3. isamba sesamba ← + inani
   - Lokhu kusho ukuthi isamba sizokwengezwa ngenani ngalinye elisohlwini.

4. BONISA isamba
   - Lokhu kusho ukuthi uhlelo luzobonisa isamba sokugcina.

Manje, ake sibale isamba sezinombolo ezisohlwini [0, 1, 4, 5]:
- isamba siqala ku-0 (numList[1])
- isamba sesamba ← 0 + 0 = 0
- isamba sesamba ← 0 + 1 = 1
- isamba sesamba ← 1 + 4 = 5
- isamba sesamba ← 5 + 5 = 10

Ngakho-ke, uhlelo lubonisa u-10, okuyisamba esifanele.

Question:
Thola ubude be-curve y = ln x phakathi kwamaphuzu lapho y = 1/2 no-y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Ukuze sithole ubude be-curve \( y = \ln x \) phakathi kwamaphuzu lapho \( y = \frac{1}{2} \) no \( y = 1 \), sizosebenzisa ifomula yokubala ubude be-curve:

\[ L = \int_{a}^{b} \sqrt{1 + \left( \frac{dy}{dx} \right)^2} \, dx \]

Okokuqala, sizodinga ukuthola imingcele ye-x ehambisana nalawa maphuzu e-y. Uma \( y = \ln x \), lapho \( y = \frac{1}{2} \):

\[ \frac{1}{2} = \ln x \implies x = e^{\frac{1}{2}} = \sqrt{e} \]

Futhi lapho \( y = 1 \):

\[ 1 = \ln x \implies x = e \]

Manje, sizodinga ukuthola \( \frac{dy}{dx} \) ye-curve \( y = \ln x \):

\[ y = \ln x \implies \frac{dy}{dx} = \frac{1}{x} \]

Ngakho-ke, ifomula yokubala ubude be-curve iba:

\[ L = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \sqrt{1 + \left( \frac{1}{x} \right)^2} \, dx \]

\[ L = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \sqrt{1 + \frac{1}{x^2}} \, dx \]

\[ L = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \sqrt{\frac{x^2 + 1}{x^2}} \, dx \]

\[ L = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \frac{\sqrt{x^2 + 1}}{x} \, dx \]

Manje, sizosebenzisa ukuguqulwa kwezinhlamvu ukuze senze lokhu kube lula. Ake sithathe \( x = \sinh t \), lapho \( \sinh t \) iyifunction ye-hyperbolic sine. Siyazi ukuthi:

\[ \frac{d}{dt} (\sinh t) = \cosh t \]

Futhi:

\[ \sinh^2 t + 1 = \cosh^2 t \]

Ngakho-ke, uma \( x = \sinh t \), khona-ke \( dx = \cosh t \, dt \). Futhi:

\[ \sqrt{x^2 + 1} = \sqrt{\sinh^2 t + 1} = \cosh t \]

Ngakho-ke, ifomula iba:

\[ L = \int_{\sinh^{-1}(\sqrt{e})}^{\sinh^{-1}(e)} \frac{\cosh t}{\sinh t} \cosh t \, dt \]

\[ L = \int_{\sinh^{-1}(\sqrt{e})}^{\sinh^{-1}(e)} \frac{\cosh^2 t}{\sinh t} \, dt \]

\[ L = \int_{\sinh^{-1}(\sqrt{e})}^{\sinh^{-1}(e)} \coth t \, \cosh t \, dt \]

\[ L = \int_{\sinh^{-1}(\sqrt{e})}^{\sinh^{-1}(e)} \cosh t \, dt \]

Manje, sizobuyela emuva ekubhaleni kwethu kokuqala. Uma sithatha \( x = e^t \), khona-ke \( dx = e^t \, dt \). Ngakho-ke:

\[ L = \int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \sqrt{1 + e^{-2t}} \, e^t \, dt \]

\[ L = \int_{\frac{1}{2}}^{1} \sqrt{e^{2t} + 1} \, dt \]

Lokhu kungaba nzima ukubala ngqo, kodwa singasebenzisa izindlela zokulinganisa noma izibalo ezitholakalayo ukuze sithole inani eliseduze. Ngokwenza izibalo, sizothola ukuthi:

\[ L \approx 0.86 \]

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele yi:

B. 0.86

Ngaphakathi kwezindaba zomphakathi, ukuloba kungaba yindlela yokuxhumana nabantu, ukuheha ukunaka, noma ukudala umphakathi ozungeze izindaba ezithile noma izinhlelo. Question:
Ucwaningo mayelana nokutholwa kolimi lwesibili luveze ukuthi yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo mayelana nezingane ezithola ulimi lwesibili
A.Ukuthuthukiswa kwabo kwengqondo kubambezelekile

C.Ubuchule babo bolimi lwendabuko abukho umphumela kwizinga lokuthola ulimi lwesibili
D.Bakhuphule ukuguquguquka kwengqondo
GivenAnswer: Ucwaningo mayelana nokutholwa kolimi lwesibili luveze ukuthi izingane ezithola ulimi lwesibili zikhuphule ukuguquguquka kwengqondo (D). Question:
Imigqa ye-magnetic field mayelana nefomu locingo elithwala njengamanje
A.imibuthano
B.imigqa ye-radial
C.eddy imisinga
D.amandla loops
GivenAnswer:
A. Imibuthano

Imigqa ye-magnetic field ezungeze ucingo oluthwala ugesi (current-carrying wire) ilandela imibuthano. Lokhu kungenxa yomthetho ka-Ampère, othi i-magnetic field edalwe ucingo oluthwala ugesi izungeza ucingo ngendlela yemibuthano. I-magnetic field lines form concentric circles around the wire, with the direction of the field given by the right-hand rule.

Question:

Question:
Ngokusho kukaNussbaum, ukuphatha umuntu njengento kuyinto

GivenAnswer:
C. akudingekile ukuba objectification ngokocansi.

Question:

Question:
Yiziphi kulezi zimo ezimbili umlingisi oyinhloko (osebenzisa I / mina / yami) enza into ngokucacile engalungile ngokuziphatha, ngokuvumelana nezindinganiso ezijwayelekile zokuziphatha e-US kusukela ngo-2020? Isimo 1 | Njengoba abazali bami babelele, ngahamba ngigijima. Isimo 2 | Ngathela i-detergent ku-washer egcwele izingubo zomuntu engihlala naye.
A.Okungalungile, Okungalungile
B.Okungalungile, Akukho okungalungile
C.Hhayi okungalungile, Okungalungile
D.Hhayi okungalungile, Hhayi okungalungile
GivenAnswer:
Impendulo efanele yi-C. Hhayi okungalungile, Okungalungile.

Isimo 1: "Njengoba abazali bami babelele, ngahamba ngigijima."
- Lokhu akubonakali kuyinto engalungile ngokuziphatha. Ukugijima kuyisenzo esivamile futhi esingokwemvelo, futhi uma umlingisi engaphazamisi noma engalimazi omunye umuntu, akubonakali kunokuziphatha okungalungile.

Isimo 2: "Ngathela i-detergent ku-washer egcwele izingubo zomuntu engihlala naye."
- Lokhu kungaba okungalungile ngokuziphatha uma umlingisi enza lokhu ngaphandle kwemvume yomuntu abahlala naye. Ukusebenzisa izinto zomunye umuntu ngaphandle kwemvume kungaphula imithetho yokuhloniphana nobumfihlo, okuyizindinganiso ezijwayelekile zokuziphatha e-US.

Question:

Question:
Yisiphi isifo amagciwane e-herpes angabangeli?
A.Ukukhubazeka kwezinsana
B.Encephalitis
C.Isifo esithathelwana ngocansi
D.Umdlavuza
GivenAnswer:
D. Umdlavuza

Amagciwane e-herpes, njenge-Herpes Simplex Virus (HSV-1 no-HSV-2), angadala izifo ezihlukahlukene ezifana nokukhubazeka kwezinsana (uma ingane ithelelwa ngesikhathi sokubeletha), encephalitis (ukuvuvukala kobuchopho), kanye nezifo ezithathelwana ngocansi. Nokho, amagciwane e-herpes awaziwa ngokubangela umdlavuza. Umdlavuza uvame ukubangelwa ezinye izinhlobo zamagciwane, njenge-Human Papillomavirus (HPV).

Question:
Inhlangano yezindlu eyayinepheshana lomhlaba. Inhlangano yezindlu yalungiselela uhlelo lokuthuthukisa ukuhlukanisa umhlaba ube yizindawo eziyi-100 nokudala umphakathi wendawo yokuhlala kuleli pheshana. I-Declaration of Covenants yadala inhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu, inhlangano yokuphatha eyayizophatha futhi iphoqelele imithetho nemikhawulo ekhonjwe phakathi kwezivumelwano. Enye yemikhawulo ebekwe ku-Declaration of Covenants ifundeka kanje:"Akusoze nganoma yisiphi isikhathi kumiswe, kuvunyelwe, noma kugcinwe kunoma iyiphi ingxenye yempahla noma yisiphi isakhiwo esenzelwe noma esisetshenziswa njenge-saloon noma indawo yokuthengisa noma ukwenziwa kwe-malt, i-vinous, noma utshwala obunommoya. " I-Declaration of Covenants yaqoshwa ngokufanele futhi yafakwa kwi-deed ethathwe nguthisha lapho ethenga inkatho 62 ekuthuthukiseni. Ngokushesha uthisha waqopha isenzo sakhe. Uthisha waqasha umuzi wakhe kumcwaningi mabhuku isikhathi sonyaka owodwa. Isivumelwano sokuqasha sasibandakanya imikhawulo efanayo naleyo eseSimemezelweni Sezivumelwano nasezenzweni zothisha. Ngokushesha umcwaningi mabhuku waqala ukuthengisa utshwala kule ndawo ngesikhathi samasonto onke "ngemuva kwamahora" amaqembu. Inhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu imangalela umcwaningi mabhuku ngesenzo somonakalo. Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okuyimpikiswano engcono kakhulu kumcwaningi mabhuku?
A.Umthetho ku-Spencer's Case uvimbela umcwaningi mabhuku ukuba abe necala.
B.Umcwaningi mabhuku akayona i-privity yesivumelwano nenhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu.
C.Umcwaningi mabhuku akayona i-privity of estate nothisha.
D.Ezinye izinto eziningi eziseduze zisetshenziselwa izinjongo zokuhweba.
GivenAnswer:
Impikiswano engcono kakhulu umcwaningi mabhuku angayisebenzisa kulesi simo ingaba:

B. Umcwaningi mabhuku akayona i-privity yesivumelwano nenhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu.

Lesi sizathu sisho ukuthi umcwaningi mabhuku, njengomqashi, akayona ingxenye yesivumelwano esenziwe phakathi kwabanikazi bezindlu (okuyinhlangano yabanikazi bezindlu kanye nothisha). Lokhu kusho ukuthi umcwaningi mabhuku akabophezelekile ngqo yimithetho nemikhawulo ebekwe ku-Declaration of Covenants ngoba akayona ingxenye yesivumelwano esenziwe phakathi kwabanikazi bezindlu. Lokhu kungaba impikiswano engcono kakhulu ngoba kugxila ekutheni umcwaningi mabhuku akabophezelekile ngqo yimithetho ebekwe ku-Declaration of Covenants, futhi lokhu kungaba yisisekelo esiqinile sokuzivikela.

Question:
Isitolo esikhulu sasisanda kuvulwa ngemuva kokuvalwa kwamasonto amabili ukuze kulungiswe. Ngekusasa lokuvulwa kabusha, owesifazane ubethenga ngesikhathi evele wawa waphuka umlenze. Ngemuva kwalokho, lo wesifazane wamangalela isitolo esikhulu ngokulimala komuntu siqu. Egqoke isudi yakhe, lo wesifazane uthe wakhubeka phezu kwebhakede lokupenda ebelilele kwelinye lama-aisles. Ngesikhathi kuqulwa icala, lo wesifazane wafonela elinye ikhasimende eyofakaza ukuthi ngesikhathi ethenga wezwa i-thud, waphenduka wabona lo wesifazane ewela phansi. Uphinde wafakaza wathi wabona ibhakede lokupenda elingenalutho lilele izinyawo ezimbalwa ukusuka emlenzeni wesifazane. Ekuhlolweni kwesiphambano, ikhasimende langena ekushintshanisweni okuxabana nommeli wesitolo esikhulu. Ngesikhathi ebuzwa umbono wakhe ngokuthi yini eyabangela ukuwa kowesifazane, umthengi wafakaza, "Wawa ngoba wakhubeka ebhakedeni. " Uvumile nokho ukuthi empeleni akazange abone lo wesifazane ehambela ebhakedeni. Question:

Question:
Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okuyiqiniso nge-hypothyroidism?
A.Ukwehla kwesisindo
B.I-myxoedema yangaphambi kwe-tibial
C.Izinga le-TSH eliphakanyisiwe
D.Ukucasulwa kwezindawo ezifudumele
GivenAnswer:
C. Izinga le-TSH eliphakanyisiwe

I-Hypothyroidism yisimo lapho i-thyroid gland ingakhiqizi amahomoni e-thyroid anele. Lokhu kuholela ekwehleni kwamazinga amahomoni e-thyroid emzimbeni. Ngenxa yalokhu kwehla kwamahomoni e-thyroid, umzimba uzama ukugqugquzela i-thyroid gland ukuthi ikhiqize amahomoni amaningi ngokukhulisa izinga le-TSH (Thyroid Stimulating Hormone). Ngakho-ke, izinga le-TSH eliphakanyisiwe liyisibonakaliso esivamile se-hypothyroidism.

Izinketho ezisele azihambisani ne-hypothyroidism:
A. Ukwehla kwesisindo kuvame ukuhlotshaniswa ne-hyperthyroidism, hhayi i-hypothyroidism.
B. I-myxoedema yangaphambi kwe-tibial ihlotshaniswa ne-hyperthyroidism, ikakhulukazi i-Graves' disease.
D. Ukucasulwa kwezindawo ezifudumele kuvame ukuhlotshaniswa ne-hyperthyroidism.

Question:
Isisebenzi senkampani enkulu yokukhiqiza sithola umsebenzi udangele, futhi silandela umsebenzi kuphela ngemali. Isisebenzi senza kancane, futhi asigqugquzelekile ngakho-ke sikhiqiza inani eliphakeme kakhulu noma ikhwalithi engcono. Ngokwe-F. Herzberg's two-factor theory, indlela engcono kakhulu ye-10 yokwandisa ukuzikhuthaza kwalo msebenzi kungaba
A.ukunikeza ukwenyuselwa imali kanye nenkokhelo yokukhuthaza umkhiqizo omkhulu
B.hlela kabusha umsebenzi ukunikeza inselelo nomqondo wokufeza
C.ukwandisa amathuba okusebenzisana nomphakathi okunolwazi
D.ukuhlinzeka isisebenzi nge-tide yomsebenzi ethwele udumo olukhulu
GivenAnswer:
Ngokwe-Frederick Herzberg's two-factor theory, izici ezithinta ukwaneliseka komsebenzi zihlukaniswa zibe izici ezikhuthazayo (motivators) nezici ezithinta inhlalakahle (hygiene factors). Izici ezikhuthazayo zihlanganisa izinto ezifana nempumelelo, ukuqashelwa, umsebenzi onenselelo, kanye nethuba lokukhula nokuthuthuka. Izici ezithinta inhlalakahle zihlanganisa izimo zomsebenzi, inkokhelo, ubudlelwano nabaphathi, kanye nezimo zomsebenzi eziphephile.

Uma sicabangela le mfundiso, indlela engcono kakhulu yokwandisa ukuzikhuthaza kwalesi sisebenzi kungaba:

B. hlela kabusha umsebenzi ukunikeza inselelo nomqondo wokufeza

Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi ukuhlela kabusha umsebenzi ukuze unikeze inselelo nomqondo wokufeza kungakhuphula ukuzikhuthaza kwesisebenzi ngokuhlinzeka ngezici ezikhuthazayo. Lokhu kungaholela ekutheni isisebenzi sizizwe sinomthelela omkhulu emsebenzini waso, sithole ukwaneliseka okukhulu, futhi sikhuphule umkhiqizo kanye nekhwalithi yomsebenzi waso.

Question:

Question:
Ukuguqulwa kunamaphutha ku-DNA ukuthi:
A.zihlala ziyingozi.

GivenAnswer:

Question:

Question:

Question:

Question:
Ukusetshenziswa okukhulu kobisi

A.Kubikwa ukuthi kuhlotshaniswa nesigameko esiphezulu sokuqhekeka nokufa okuphezulu ezifundweni ezimbalwa
B.Ngesikhathi sokuvuthwa kubonakala sengathi kuhlotshaniswa nobuningi obuphezulu bamaminerali amathambo ekuphileni kwasekupheleni
C.Ihlotshaniswa njalo nezinga eliphansi lokuphuka
D.Emazweni anezinga eliphakeme kakhulu lokuphuka kubonisa ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kobisi kuzuzisa amathambo.
GivenAnswer:
A. Kubikwa ukuthi kuhlotshaniswa nesigameko esiphezulu sokuqhekeka nokufa okuphezulu ezifundweni ezimbalwa.

Ukusetshenziswa kobisi kanye nemikhiqizo yobisi kuye kwahlolwa kakhulu ocwaningweni lwezempilo. Nakuba ubisi luhlobene nokutholakala kwamaminerali abalulekile njenge-calcium, okubalulekile ekwakheni amathambo aqinile, kunezifundo ezithile eziphakamisa ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kobisi okukhulu kungase kuhlotshaniswe nesigameko esiphezulu sokuqhekeka kwamathambo nokufa okuphezulu. Lokhu kungase kube ngenxa yezici ezihlukahlukene, okuhlanganisa izici zomzimba kanye nezici zokudla ezihambisana nokusetshenziswa kobisi.

Ngakho-ke, kubalulekile ukuthi abantu bathole iseluleko sezempilo esivela kochwepheshe bezokudla noma odokotela ukuze baqonde kangcono izidingo zabo zomzimba kanye nokudla okufanele.

Question:
Yimaphi amaphuzu alandelayo asekela impikiswano ye-unilateralism yaseMelika?
A.Benevolent hegemony
B.Ukungasebenzi kwe-multilateralism
C.amandla American
D.Konke okungenhla
GivenAnswer:
D. Konke okungenhla

Amaphuzu alandelayo asekela impikiswano ye-unilateralism yaseMelika:

A. **Benevolent hegemony**: Lokhu kubhekisela kumbono wokuthi i-United States, njengamandla amakhulu, ingasebenza njengomholi onomusa, isebenzise amandla ayo ukuze izuze umhlaba wonke, futhi izuze izintshisekelo zayo ngaphandle kokubambisana okukhulu kwamazwe amaningi.

B. **Ukungasebenzi kwe-multilateralism**: Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi izindlela zokubambisana kwamazwe amaningi (multilateralism) zivame ukuba buthaka, zingasebenzi kahle, noma zithinteke izintshisekelo ezihlukahlukene zamazwe amaningi, okwenza kube nzima ukufinyelela izivumelwano ezisebenzayo.

C. **Amandla American**: Lokhu kubhekisela ekutheni i-United States inamandla amakhulu kwezomnotho, ezempi, nezepolitiki, okungayenza ikwazi ukuthatha izinyathelo ezizimele (unilateral actions) ukuze ifinyelele izintshisekelo zayo ngaphandle kokuncika kakhulu kwabanye.

Ngakho-ke, zonke lezi zinto zixhasa impikiswano ye-unilateralism yaseMelika.

Question:
Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okuchaza kahle imihlahlandlela yokuziphatha mayelana nokusondelana ngokocansi namaklayenti angaphambili okwelashwa?
A.Izazi zengqondo zinqatshelwe ukuba nobuhlobo bobulili namaklayenti angaphambili okwelashwa ngaphansi kwanoma yiziphi izimo.
B.Izazi zengqondo zinqatshelwe ukuba nobuhlobo bobulili namakhasimende angaphambili okwelashwa okungenani unyaka owodwa ngemuva kokuqedwa kokwelashwa.
C.Izazi zengqondo zinqatshelwe ukuba nobuhlobo bobulili namaklayenti angaphambili okwelashwa ezimweni ezithile (isib., Lapho kunengozi yokuxhashazwa).
D.Izazi zengqondo azivinjelwe ukuba nobuhlobo bobulili namaklayenti angaphambili okwelashwa.
GivenAnswer:
Imihlahlandlela yokuziphatha mayelana nokusondelana ngokocansi namaklayenti angaphambili okwelashwa ihlukahluka kuye ngohlelo lwezokwelapha kanye nezwe. Nokho, iningi lezinhlangano ezihola phambili kwezokwelapha, njenge-American Psychological Association (APA), linemihlahlandlela ecacile mayelana nalolu daba.

Ngokwe-APA Ethical Principles of Psychologists and Code of Conduct, izazi zengqondo zinqatshelwe ukuba nobuhlobo bobulili namaklayenti angaphambili okungenani unyaka owodwa ngemuva kokuqedwa kokwelashwa. Ngisho nangemva kwalowo nyaka owodwa, izazi zengqondo kufanele zicabangele ngokucophelela ukuthi ubuhlobo obunjalo bungaba yini imiphumela emibi kumaklayenti angaphambili. Uma kunengozi yokuxhashazwa noma uma ubuhlobo bungaba nomthelela ongemuhle kumaklayenti, kufanele buvinjelwe.

Ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele kakhulu kulokhu okulandelayo ingaba:

B. Izazi zengqondo zinqatshelwe ukuba nobuhlobo bobulili namakhasimende angaphambili okwelashwa okungenani unyaka owodwa ngemuva kokuqedwa kokwelashwa.

Question:

" Umthengisi wathola izincwadi zendoda ngoMashi 20. Ngo-Ephreli 1, umthengisi wathumela i-telegram kule ndoda, echaza: "Kuyabonakala ukuthi asinayo inkontileka ephoqelelwe ukusebenza. Umthengisi uqinisekisa ukuvikelwa komthetho wokukhwabanisa ngaphansi kwe-UCC. Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo isitatimende esinembile kakhulu mayelana nokuzivikela komthengisi?

Question:
Ukuzivumelanisa nezitshalo ukunciphisa ukulahleka kwamanzi ezindaweni ezinamazinga okushisa aphezulu kufaka phakathi yikuphi okulandelayo?
A.Stomata eziningi
B.Ama-cuticles amancane

GivenAnswer:
Ukuzivumelanisa nezitshalo ukunciphisa ukulahleka kwamanzi ezindaweni ezinamazinga okushisa aphezulu kufaka phakathi okulandelayo:

C. Imigogodla esikhundleni samaqabunga

Izitshalo ezihlala ezindaweni ezishisayo nezomile zivame ukuba nezinguquko ezisiza ukunciphisa ukulahleka kwamanzi. - D. Izilinganiso ezinkulu ze-surface-to-volume: Izilinganiso ezinkulu ze-surface-to-volume zisho indawo enkulu yokulahleka kwamanzi.

Ngakho-ke, inketho C iyona efanele kakhulu.

Question:
Yiziphi izitatimende ezilandelayo mayelana ne-glucose metabolism ezilungile?

B.I-Glycolysis idinga i-NADP +
C.Ku-glycolysis, i-glucose i-cleaved ibe yimikhiqizo emibili ye-carbon emithathu

GivenAnswer:
Ake sihlole izitatimende ezilandelayo mayelana ne-glucose metabolism:

A. I-Glucagon yandisa izinga le-glycolysis
- Lokhu akulona iqiniso. I-Glucagon empeleni yandisa i-gluconeogenesis (ukwakheka kwe-glucose entsha) futhi inciphisa i-glycolysis (ukwephulwa kwe-glucose) ukuze inyuse amazinga e-glucose egazini.

B. I-Glycolysis idinga i-NADP+
- Lokhu akulona iqiniso. I-Glycolysis idinga i-NAD+ (nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide) hhayi i-NADP+ (nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide phosphate).

C. Ku-glycolysis, i-glucose i-cleaved ibe yimikhiqizo emibili ye-carbon emithathu
- Lokhu kuyiqiniso. I-glucose (i-molecule ye-carbon eyisithupha) i-cleaved ibe yimikhiqizo emibili ye-carbon emithathu, okuyi-pyruvate.

D. Umkhiqizo wokugcina we-glycolysis kumaseli abomvu egazi yi-pyruvate
- Lokhu akulona iqiniso ngokuphelele. Ngenxa yokuthi amaseli abomvu egazi awanawo ama-mitochondria, i-pyruvate ekhiqizwa ku-glycolysis iguqulwa ibe yi-lactate nge-lactate dehydrogenase.

C. Ku-glycolysis, i-glucose i-cleaved ibe yimikhiqizo emibili ye-carbon emithathu
